info.name: Google Search Tools Back
info.description: Brings back Google search tools to left side and displays drop-down menu items.
info.additionalInfo: Description * Brings back Google search tools to left side. * Displays all action menu items ("Cached", "Similar", etc.). * Adds underline to search result title. * Adds highlight search keywords. What's New Latest Update: Jun 27, 2015 * [Fix] Minor bugs fixed. * [Add] Added a option to display checkmarks on the sidebar. * [Remove] Removed "Display all tabs" for horizontal tabs because Google changed the menu structure and it is now difficult to display tabs through pure CSS. License The MIT License (MIT) - http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT Copyright (c) 2012-2015 Ming-Hsien Lin (akiratw)
